channel.title: Comments on: Peter Saville designs limited edition ‘Control’ t-shirt

item.title: By: Jaime
item.dc:creator: Jaime
item.description: The description doesn't mention that the white text is actually silver & it shines. I have one, i feel like a christmas tree when i wear it, it's awful. It'a not worth 50 pounds!
item.content:encoded:
The description doesn’t mention that the white text is actually silver & it shines. I have one, i feel like a christmas tree when i wear it, it’s awful.
It’a not worth 50 pounds!

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: That's good. I can save my money for the flight to the UK to catch the opening night screening.
item.content:encoded: That’s good. I can save my money for the flight to the UK to catch the opening night screening.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: i think they've completely sold out, so you're probably safe.
item.content:encoded: i think they’ve completely sold out, so you’re probably safe.
